div.p:
緊急 (きんきゅう) — urgent
急ぐ (いそぐ) — to hurry
急増 (きゅうぞう) — rapid increase
急速 (きゅうそく) — rapid (e.g., progress)
早急 (さっきゅう) — urgent
急激 (きゅうげき) — sudden
急性 (きゅうせい) — acute (e.g., illness)
急きょ (きゅうきょ) — hurriedly
急落 (きゅうらく) — sudden fall
急進 (きゅうしん) — rapid progress
救急 (きゅうきゅう) — first-aid
急騰 (きゅうとう) — sudden rise
特急 (とっきゅう) — limited express (train, faster than an express)
救急車 (きゅうきゅうしゃ) — ambulance
急成長 (きゅうせいちょう) — rapid growth
急務 (きゅうむ) — urgent business
急死 (きゅうし) — sudden death
急ピッチ (きゅうピッチ) — quick pace
急ぎ (いそぎ) — haste
緩急 (かんきゅう) — pace

This page was generated using kanjioftheday, written by Douglas Paul Perkins. Kanji lists came from the Ministry of Education. Example words are derived from a word frequency list by Alexandre Girardi. Dictionary information is taken from KANJIDIC2 and EDICT.
